name: Grooves per Second
description:
Burdened with a life of being too cool, Chuck must constantly tend to all of his social media accounts. 

Luckily, he has a new fancy app, Grooves Per Second, on his phone that let's him listen to his favorite funky music while giving directions on where to go. 

This lets Chuck walk through the world's longest sidewalk without ever having to look away from his phone. 

Chuck has a reputation to uphold and can't be seen looking uncool. 

Play in two different modes:

Distance or Time Trial

Use WASD to select your direction arrow

Click on floor to place an arrow

Credits:

Programming and art:

Anonymous Shrimp - Micah Lai

Sound Design:

SilentDrumr - Mario Acero

(City ambience SFX sampled from freesound.org)
